title: Jyllands-Posten, a national newspaper in Denmark, caters to the values of right-wing liberals. The right-wing political parties in Denmark have been critical of the immigrant communities in the country and, when in political opposition, have criticized the left-wing government for social ills they attribute to visible minority immigrant communities.
